description:
Title: Machine Learning Architect

Duration: 6 months

Mode of Interview: Video

Location: Phoenix AZ Onsite

Machine Learning Architect that will help spearhead the companies latest deliverable.
• This role is CRITICAL for hiring manager, in particular for coverage on the "Leach to the last drop" initiative (aka project "Helena").
• It's the build out of an analytics product to optimize recovery (McKinsey driving and Freeport also on project team)
• High visibility mentioned on quarterly earnings call, all company marketing, etc
• The role is not only about this project (though there is a tactical need there) it's an overall leadership position on Robert's team (e.g., establishing and enforcing standards)
• Candidate should have a firm grasp of managing cloud assets (specifically identity). We prefer Azure but anything would be considered
• Candidate should be a strong python software engineer. It is our main language and as an ML Architect they should be ensuring the team is following best practices in coding and ci/cd
• Candidate should be senior enough to lead people
